document: Words are like seeds. They have creative power. Isaiah says, "We will eat the fruit of our words." What seeds are you planting?
People who make you feel better about yourself when you’re sad are so important.
A good person gives love because they want love in return. A spiritual person gives love because they want more love in the world.
I love when people that have been through hell walk out of the flames carrying buckets of water for those still consumed by the fire.
Keep your mind going in the right direction, and your life will catch up with it.
God has a blessing with your name on it.
Keep your mind going in the right direction, and your life will catch up with it.
Blessed....no matter what I am dealing with.
